inclusion.criterion: NIHSS ≥ 4 or isolated aphasia or isolated hemianopsia
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of stroke in the last 6 weeks
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Surgery, biopsy, trauma or LP in last 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Head trauma in the last 90 days
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and denies chest pain, dyspnea on exertion, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, orthopnea, palpitations, syncope or presyncope.
